channel.title: So this kid
channel.description:
I'm at the library with my friends, and one of them takes out their labtop. He opens it up and the screen is totally cracked in half. I lol'd a little bit, but then I srs'd. He blames it on me, and he got his Dad, one of those dad's who sits around and watches football for >5 hours because he is devoiced, to come yell at me [i]At the library[/i].
This Kid's Claim that I broke it = I SAW UR FOOTPRINT ON MAI BCKPACK AND U MST HVE STEPPED ON IT.
My Rebuttal to his claim = There is no footprint on your bag. ( This was an hour or so after he saw the print ) Therefore, your claim is not valid.
Kid's Rebuttal to me = IT WUS UR FOOTPRINT U GOTTA BUY ME NEW LABTOP
My Rebuttal = No Proof -> No Labtop.
So then he gets his dad to yell at me, calling me a 'pussy' for having a legit rebuttal. The dad asks the kid next to me if he did it, his words "I didn't do it.". Dad's response, SEE THAT KID AN'T A FAG AND HE JUST SAYS HE DIDN'T DO IT NOT BE A PILE OF SHIT AND MAKE BULL SHIT WORDS.
So I'm lawling right now at the stupidity of people today. Irony 2 da max = Before this thing happened, this kid kept his cookies for my account on a website, and got it deleted. Karma, anyone?
If anyone wants to Rebut some of my points, or make claims for me, your welcome to : )
-Linksbro ( who is lawling )

item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Army Life: You are a hamburger face.

@TOPIC:
Last year at school, the teacher was a bitch, so I just brought my laptop to school and played GTA3/VC all day instead of doing my work. Good times… She caught me on the second to last day though…
